Articles.Content:
so i was thinking, despite there being good solid support for making a Kerbin map on Civ 5 but not happened yet, could someone actually do this?

also, i was also thinking about it having a specialised nation mod for only specific RP nations that have remained active throughout KSP Roleplaying and show no signs of becoming inactive or being destroyed (or those that lasted at least 2-3 months)

These would be (So far):

- [li]Taheireaz[/li]  
[li]Makavi[/li]  
[li]Avienne[/li]  
[li]Spearkan Federation[/li]  
[li]Forseti[/li]  
[li]Angleland[/li]  
[li]Medwedia?[/li]  
[li]Ghritz?[/li]  
[li]Niveus?[/li]  
[li]Endela?[/li]  
[li]Karkraz?[/li]  
[li]Atlantegio[/li]

opinions plz and if you do make this you have my credit

Angleland. Yus.

We could have a pre-reboot version, too.

> 
> Angleland. Yus.
> 
> We could have a pre-reboot version, too.

the problem is is that most pre-reboot nations are no longer existent e.g.Brushshantanda (crap spelling sorry) and Endela, and that even more post-reboot nations no longer exist e.g Miroin
True, dat. If someone could make a Civ 4 version, it would be a help for me \'cause I don\'t have V. :C

Support. Can the UoSo- you know what I mean.

Also, let us all hope that this doesn\'t violate that ruling. Unless, of course, you actually *want* a ban.

> 
> Support. Can the UoSo- you know what I mean.
> 
> Also, let us all hope that this doesn\'t violate that ruling. Unless, of course, you actually *want* a ban.

sorry, but to actually be part of it it has to stand for quite a long time, my nation has been in RP for a few months
Ghritz has been for some time... Don\'t you think?

> 
> Ghritz has been for some time... Don\'t you think?

i suppose, i think it has been around for the same duration as Medwedia
Spearka, I suggest you take this down right away. Damion said that if we posted RP in any other forums, it could be punishable.

> 
> Spearka, I suggest you take this down right away. Damion said that if we posted RP in any other forums, it could be punishable.

I think he meant KSP related forums, not off-topic.

> 
> Spearka, I suggest you take this down right away. Damion said that if we posted RP in any other forums, it could be punishable.

Nobody\'s roleplaying.

> 
> Spearka, I suggest you take this down right away. Damion said that if we posted RP in any other forums, it could be punishable.

This isn\'t roleplay, it\'s a suggestion for a mod on another game that has the features of KSP RP that would only make sense on this forum

Yes, this isn\'t the best place.

If you change it to a request for a civilisation map of Kerbin that would be best. And no mention of countries and such, maybe just a Kerbal mod. With Kerbals and rockets.
after the official announcement of taking down RP completely, i would seriously consider this concept, if we can\'t take KSP RP to KSP itself, the least we can do is simulate it in another game

> 
> after the official announcement of taking down RP completely, i would seriously consider this concept, if we can\'t take KSP RP to KSP itself, the least we can do is simulate it in another game

Or another forum... They exist, like mine!

> 
> Or another forum... They exist, like mine!

and it\'s not too good, btw im still sticking with the civ V idea
What, no Charzalia/Lumina/Alurdas/Masitas?

> 
> What, no Charzalia/Lumina/Alurdas/Masitas?

all 4 of those nations are completely different, also neither of them lasted long enough

btw if i could make a nation mod i could....but......

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/t348e24vDyA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Where\'s Niveus in that list?

Or Itaalicia for that matter

Or an unstable politically formed SRE

> 
> Or Itaalicia for that matter
> 
> Or an unstable politically formed SRE

none of them lasted significantly enough to be part of it

> 
> Where\'s Niveus in that list?

ooh...dunno, but im not sure if it has lasted long enough

> 
> none of them lasted significantly enough to be part of itooh...dunno, but im not sure if it has lasted long enough

Niveus lasted from 21 February prereboot, 23 March post reboot to 1 April. 

Itaalicia lasted from 1 April to 21 April (wait, it was that little? didn\'t realize)

SRE lasted like 2 days

Niveus then lasted about another month.

I\'d say Itaalicia lasted enough to warrant it being included, and the SRE was an important event.
Btw guys, I got Civ V Game-of-the-year yesterday, so no need to make a Civ IV map. :3c

> 
> all 4 of those nations are completely different, also neither of them lasted long enough

Actually, they all had the same people and were effectively the same nation except for the fact that the government system was different each time.

> 
> Actually, they all had the same people and were effectively the same nation except for the fact that the government system was different each time.

exactly, the nations were different politically, but not in terms of size, btw 

> 
> Niveus lasted from 21 February prereboot, 23 March post reboot to 1 April. 
> 
> Itaalicia lasted from 1 April to 21 April (wait, it was that little? didn\'t realize)
> 
> SRE lasted like 2 days
> 
> Niveus then lasted about another month.
> 
> I\'d say Itaalicia lasted enough to warrant it being included, and the SRE was an important event.

neither lasted 2-3 months, which would fit the prerequisites

> 
> exactly, the nations were different politically, but not in terms of size, btw

Like a Civ V nation, which can go from being communist to facist to democratic in the space of a few turns.
